problems.title: Check if an Array is a Max Heap
problems.description:
Problem Statement

Given an array, check if it represents a valid max heap.

Max Heap Property:
- Parent node >= its children
- For index i: left child at 2*i+1, right child at 2*i+2

Input Format
First line: N (size of array)
Second line: N space-separated integers

Output Format
Print "YES" if array is max heap, else "NO".

Example
Input:
5
40 25 30 10 20

Output:
YES
problems.examples:
Sample Input 1
5
40 25 30 10 20

Sample Output 1
YES

Sample Input 2
3
10 20 30

Sample Output 2
NO
